articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: Miley Cyrus Says She Wasn’t ‘Taken Seriously at the Grammys’ Until ‘Flowers’ Wins: ‘If You Want to Talk Impact on Culture, Then Where the F— Was I?’ - Variety
articles.description: Miley Cyrus said that her Grammy wins for hit single "Flowers" marked her "first time actually being taken seriously" at the awards ceremony.
articles.content:
Miley Cyrus is getting real about the Grammys, saying that her wins for hit single “Flowers” in February marked her “first time actually being taken seriously” at the awards ceremony.
In a new inter… [+2823 chars]
